column1:
"
Maintaining a balanced and healthy diet can help manage weight by providing the necessary nutrients and energy for the body without consuming excess calories. It's important to consume a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean protein sources, and healthy fats. Regular physical activity is also recommended to burn calories and maintain muscle mass. If you have any concerns about your weight or diet, it's best to consult with a healthcare professional for personalized advice and guidance." "Una dieta equilibrata che include cibi nutrienti e moderati apporti calorici può aiutare a mantenere un peso sano. È consigliabile consumare porzioni controllate
column2: limitare i cibi ad alto contenuto di grassi e zuccheri
column3: aumentare l'assunzione di frutta e verdura e bere abbondante acqua. Consulta un dietologo per un piano personalizzato."
